xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/501877-Accordion Tribe: Music Travels 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bNkkZfZzh6OQYL6D7LNyjips2i2.jpg Five highly original musicians from different countries form the Accordion Tribe. Together they aim to reinforce the original power of the long disdained instrument. The film follows the energetic soundscapes and their performers on a journey through Europe. An extraordinarily intensive documentary on the communicative, connecting power of music. Accordion Tribe: Music Travels
